title: non-ascii text was converted to escape sequence when download datasets
body:
How to reproduce the behaviour
---------
<!-- Before submitting an issue, make sure to check the docs and closed issues and FAQ to see if any of the solutions work for you. https://github.com/doccano/doccano/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions -->

<!-- Include a code example or the steps that led to the problem. Please try to be as specific as possible. -->
launch doccano v1.3.1 using docker-compose.prod.yml then upload a datum as following jsonl (sequence-labeling)
```json
{"text": "escapeされる", "label": [ [0, 6, "ASCII"]]}
```
and download, then the content is following

```json
{"id": 4, "data": "escape\u3055\u308c\u308b", "label": [[0, 6, "ASCII"]]}
```
Since doccano v1.2 renders non-ascii texts with no escape when downloading, I think it's suitable to do so in v1.3.

I think this issue will be solved as same way as https://github.com/doccano/doccano/pull/670/commits/63044f942b5e9dd35bc2c95be39ce9e53ba90fff , so then I will submit a pull-request for this issue.
If any patch for this issue is scheduled, please discard this PR.

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
*   Operating System: macOS 11.2.3
*   Docker version: v20.10.2
*   doccano version: v1.3.1
